description: Let AI agents interact with real BLE hardware — scan, connect, read, write, and subscribe.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.es617/ble-mcp-server

environmentVariables.description: Enable BLE characteristic writes (off by default for safety)
environmentVariables.name: BLE_MCP_ALLOW_WRITES

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated UUID allowlist for writable characteristics
environmentVariables.name: BLE_MCP_WRITE_ALLOWLIST

environmentVariables.description: Plugin policy: 'all' or comma-separated plugin names. Unset = disabled.
environmentVariables.name: BLE_MCP_PLUGINS
